EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering your interest in Step Forward!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for registering your interest in Step Forward!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
You have taken the first steps towards securing your future. We are interested in ambitious, committed and adaptable young people and we’re really excited that you want to find out more.
If you are selected onto Step Forward we will provide you with valuable work experience, invaluable personal and professional development training and a qualification that will set you apart from your peers, make you more employable and help you to launch your career in the future.
Those who are selected and graduate from Step Forward will have:
completed 12 months of full time work with a high quality employer received a salary of £9,000 a nationally recognised qualification equivalent to an A-level developed essential skills that employers look for such as teamwork, leadership and problem solving received support from their own professional mentor to get the most of the year and beyond shared their experience with other like minded people and formed lasting friendships​
The application deadline for September 2015 has now passed. However we would still welcome your application and if there is availability on Step Forward those who have already applied will be fast tracked.
Follow the application form unique to you to apply today.
For hints and tips on how to write an impressive application form and maximise your chances of being selected, check out our website at www.stepforward.uk.com.
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
Best of luck with your application, and we hope to see you at a Step Forward assessment!
